house_listing.house_description: Custom built home on excellent lake LBJ cove water. This three bedroom, two and one-half bath home has seperate breakfast and formal dining areas, tile floors, beautiful built-ins, sprinkler system and lake pump, Hallmark roof, attached two car garage, workshop and a large covered lakeside patio. The kitchen is complete with dishwasher, disposal, microwave, oven and jenn-aire/grill. The waterfront is ready to go, complete with a retaining wall and boat dock with lift.

highlights.item: 3 bedroom, 2.5 baths,on a wonder lake LBJ cove.
Vaulted ceilings, tile floors, jenn-air, built ins
Sprinkler system, boat dock w/shop and deck.
